alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 4:15PM AKST until January 26 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Blowing snow reducing visibility to one half mile or less at times. Heavy drifting snow. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Upper Koyukuk Valley. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 55 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will occur everywhere. Windy conditions with blowing and drifting snow will occur over Dalton Highway Summits.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
